mdes.slick.sui.event
Interface MouseListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Listener
All Known Implementing Classes:
MouseAdapter
public interface MouseListener
extends Listener

An interface to receive mouse events.

Since:
b.0.2

Method Summary
 void mouseDragged(MouseEvent e)
          Notification that the mouse has been dragged.
 void mouseEntered(MouseEvent e)
          Notification that the mouse has entered the bounds of the component.
 void mouseExited(MouseEvent e)
          Notification that the mouse has exited the bounds of the component.

          Notification that the mouse has moved.
 void mousePressed(MouseEvent e)
          Notification that the mouse has been pressed.
 void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e)

Method Detail

mouseMoved

public void mouseMoved(MouseEvent e)
Notification that the mouse has moved.

Parameters:
e - the event associated with this listener

mouseDragged

public void mouseDragged(MouseEvent e)
Notification that the mouse has been dragged. Dragging the mouse will not call a mouseMoved event, and will instead call mouseDragged.

Parameters:
e - the event associated with this listener

mousePressed

public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e)
Notification that the mouse has been pressed.

Parameters:
e - the event associated with this listener

mouseReleased

public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e)
Notification that the mouse has been released.

Parameters:
e - the event associated with this listener

mouseEntered

public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent e)
Notification that the mouse has entered the bounds of the component.

Parameters:
e - the event associated with this listener

mouseExited

public void mouseExited(MouseEvent e)
Notification that the mouse has exited the bounds of the component.

Parameters:
e - the event associated with this listener
